author: Epictetus
text: If you want to improve, be content to be thought foolish and stupid.

author: Eminem
text: I'm stupid, I'm ugly, I'm dumb, I smell. Did I mention I'm stupid?

author: Nikolai Gogol
text: You can't imagine how stupid the whole world has grown nowadays.

author: Diogenes
text: Man is the most intelligent of the animals - and the most silly.

author: Mike Leach
text: There's nothing balanced about the 50 percent run, 50 percent pass because that's 50 percent stupid.

author: Unknown
text: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid.

author: Confucius
text: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.

author: Denis Diderot
text: Man will never be free until the last king is strangled with the entrails of the last priest.

author: Epicurus
text: The time when most of you should withdraw into yourself is when you are forced to be in a crowd.

author: Aristotle
text: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.

author: Aristotle
text: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.

author: Epicurus
text: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.

author: Heraclitus
text: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.

author: Socrates
text: The greatest way to live with honor in this world is to be what we pretend to be.

author: Diogenes
text: I threw my cup away when I saw a child drinking from his hands at the trough.

author: Plato
text: People are like dirt. They can either nourish you and help you grow as a person or they can stunt your growth and make you wilt and die.

author: Plutarch
text: I would rather excel in the knowledge of what is excellent, than in the extent of my power and possessions.

author: George W. Bush
text: Some folks look at me and see a certain swagger, which in Texas is called 'walking'.

author: Tim Berners-Lee
text: You affect the world by what you browse.

author: Elon Musk
text: We're already cyborgs. Your phone and your computer are extensions of you, but the interface is through finger movements or speech, which are very slow.

author: Buddha
text: Unity can only be manifested by the Binary. Unity itself and the idea of Unity are already two.
